item.title: Intro to C++
item.description: C++ is a statically typed, compiled language, and it can be used across multiple platforms. Moreover, C++ is a great programming language for high-performance computing as it provides the user with much control over memory and system resources. It is also great for object-oriented programming and therefore it is used for a wide range of applications. item.title: Rcpp
item.description: The aim of this portfolio is to demonstrate the usage of C++ in conjunction with R via the Rcpp package. The application that we are considering is the adaptive kernel regression smoothing. Simulate data generated by the model \[y_i = sin(\alpha\pi x^3)+z_i, \;\; \text{where}\;z_i \sim\mathcal{N}(0,\sigma^2),\] for \(i=1, \cdots, 400\), \(\alpha=4\), and \(\sigma=0.2\). set.seed(42) n <- 400 x <- runif(n) y <- sin(4 * pi * x^3) + rnorm(n, 0, 0.
